directions: Whisk vinegar and mustard in small bowl; gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing generously with salt and pepper. Combine cauliflower, olives, and celery in large bowl. Add 3/4 cup dressing; toss to coat. Cover salad and remaining dressing separately; chill overnight.
Mix green onions and parsley into salad. Arrange arugula on platter; drizzle with remaining dressing. Top arugula with cauliflower mixture. Sprinkle with pepper.
ingredients: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
1 large head of cauliflower, cut into 1-inch florets (about 6 cups)
title: Marinated Cauliflower, Olive, and Arugula Salad
